website_summaries.verdict: This shampoo and conditioner set is great for those who have damaged hair.
pros: The moisturizing formula repairs hair and makes it feel stronger, thicker, and shinier
Gives hair a soft and silky feel
cons: Conditioner takes a while to wash out

customer_reviews.title: Conditioner STRONG toxic smell!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Conditioner has BAD chemical smell! I LOVE this stuff and was so excited to get it and use it! I’ve used it for years and nothing smells as good as this stuff... I’ve ordered from this site before and things seemed ok the last time..conditioner may have been a bit off but it wasn’t bad enough to where i wouldn’t use it.. but this time? Oh hell no! It smells toxic! Literally! The shampoo smells close enough but the conditioner is DEFINITELY NOT THE REAL TIGI PRODUCT! The smell is way off, chemically, and it’s super greasy! It’s like conditioning my hair with oil! I will be seeking a refund or return! Really disappointed with this seller:(
customer_reviews.author: Emily M

customer_reviews.title: It's diluted with something else
customer_reviews.text: The REAL tigi bedhead stuff is amazing. Do NOT buy it online! Go to a salon and buy the real deal. Its worth the extra money to get the real stuff. I ordered this on here and its absolute garbage! My best friend is a stylist and had me bring it into her salon to "compare" to the ones she had and THEY ARE NOT THE SAME!! Save your hair the torture.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Horribly expired possibly fake product
customer_reviews.text: I decided to ignore the reviews about this being a badly expired possibly fake product.... Bad idea. The shampoo and conditioner expired 15 months ago! On top of that it didnt smell or feel like the real deal and wasnt sealed just like previous reviews stated. The overpowering chemical and perfume smells were enough to gag even someone without a sense of smell before I even opened the box by the time I opened the bottles it was making my eyes water. I definetly regret ignoring the bad reviews thankfully Amazon let me return it no issues.
customer_reviews.author: felixgriz

customer_reviews.title: Expired chemical smell.. pass on this one!
customer_reviews.text: Expired 6 months ago! And even if it wasn't expired (which honestly how many of us have seen expired shampoo & conditioner or thought to check) but the smell if the conditioner is like a overwhelming chemical smell & the shampoo smells like rancid strawberries. I thought I was getting such a great deal, but should have read all the other complaints of chemical smell, because it's true, this stuff stinks.
customer_reviews.author: B.Slater

customer_reviews.title: New Hair!!
customer_reviews.text: A couple years ago, I had a hysterectomy and between the anesthesia and hormone changes, my hair was extremely damaged. It was already damaged from years of bleaching. My stylist told me about Bed Head Resurrection, so I bought the set in the salon when it was on sale. It was amazing and the next time I went to have my hair cut, she said it was healthier than it had ever been. Sadly, they didn't have a sale so I looked for the product on Amazon and found it here and have been purchasing ever since. This product is the same product as in the salon, looks the same, smells the same and works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t touch the conditioner with a 10ft pole
customer_reviews.text: Got my package in the mail today and used it tonight while in the shower. Shampoo lathered up fine, smelled nice. Rinsed the shampoo and was quite happy with how it felt wet (soft & clean!) I went on to open the conditioner, squeezed a dime sized amount into my hand and got a very unpleasant smell hit my nose. I leaned closer to the conditioner and realized that was what was causing it... smelled like actual chemicals, putting a burning sensation in my nose. Immediately, washed off and scrubbed my hands/anywhere the conditioner touched. So far hasn’t caused my skin any irritation but my god, the smell was so unpleasant. Will be throwing away the shampoo & conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Hair felt sticky and flat every time I used this shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo made my hair feel sticky and dry. I felt as though i was left with a residue every time I used it, my hair looked flat and lifeless. I have very fine, blonde hair that gets oily quickly. I would not recommend this product for anyone with fine hair like mine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Way

customer_reviews.title: See past the bad reviews....
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well! I'm surprised to see so many awful reviews from a couple of years ago, and maybe they have fixed the issue since then? All I know is that this stuff rejuvenated my hair, smelled wonderful and worked wonders for my hair :) Plus, it wasn't expired!
customer_reviews.author: jericorn

customer_reviews.title: Same as Ulta Beauty
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand all the bad reviews I saw about this product because I have nothing bad to say. I purchased my first two bottles through Ulta and these are exactly the same for much less. I recommend leaving the conditioner on during your shower for 10 minutes then rinse right before you finish your shower. I’ve done this and it makes my hair much smoother and easier to comb once I air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I live in E. Tennessee where the weather and water are harsh on my baby fine hair causing it to dry out break off bad. Ive never had this happen living in Florida. I freaked out. Tried all kinds of product to no avial. My son gave me my first bed head resurrection. And YAY!!!! Within a couple of days, the breaking off quit. It works in both states which i was afraid using it in fla. I travel regularly between fla. and tenn. and thought would be too much as was the case with other product. Im extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli j Nesbitt

customer_reviews.title: Sort of conflicted on this purchase. 1/2 good.
customer_reviews.text: I spent the extra money and bought the Exclusive. While it works fairly well, not great, what really throws me most is the shampoo smells amazing as I expected but the conditioner has a really weird sort of chemical smell that is really off putting and I really don't like or want to use it. Also it was a much better price, less than half of what I paid during the half price sale at one of the major beauty chain store this month (that rhymes with Bolta) and both the shampoo and conditioner smell amazing so I wish I had just waited for that sale.
customer_reviews.author: shopgirl77

customer_reviews.title: almost dead, but it came back
customer_reviews.text: I ha old lady hair, dry, brittle and lifeless after too many trips to the hairdresser too frequently. Adding to that I use hot rollers and hot curler stick. OUCH. It took two washings, so a week, then recovery of the sort you hope for. My natural curls even returned. Now, this is a review from a lady that has tried everything on the market for lifeless hair.
customer_reviews.author: SDSara.

customer_reviews.title: saved my hair from being chopped off
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo and conditioner. My hair is left feeling clean, untangled and soft. I not only feel a difference but actually, see how much better my hair looks. I still have damage but not the dry brittle frizz I had before using this, TIGI Bed Head Resurrection Shampoo/Conditioner (25.36oz) Set. I am not a huge fan of the smell but it's not bad. This is not going to make your hair "brand new" again but it's sure gonna feel close.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa R.

customer_reviews.title: Raw bleeding head
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure if zero stars were an option. About a month after starting use of this product my head begin to severely itch . My scalp became dangerously raw and bled . Turns out my shampoo was over a year expired. Whatever chemicals are in this are apparently pretty harsh when expired as it basically ate through my scalp. The entire experience was awful So I’m hoping people are careful :(
customer_reviews.author: Eliana Villagomez

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is the best shampoo and conditioner that i have ever tried at home. I am super tender headed and am natural! My hair is thick! I’ve used this one time! My hair is so soft and manageable. I was able to get it combed and blow dried without crying, which is saying a lot. Thanks for an awesome product! I have two daughters whose hair are thicker than mine! You have just gained 3 new customers.
customer_reviews.author: Dinky

customer_reviews.title: Best Shampoo/Conditioner for damaged or course hair.
customer_reviews.text: My beautician recommended TIGI Bed Head Resurrection products after I had a bad experience in bleaching my hair. The transformation was like magic. My hair was totally unmanageable before, but after using the shampoo and conditioner, even one time, it became soft and manageable. I continue to use this long after the bleach damage has grown out and highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brin

customer_reviews.title: It was amazing how restored my hair
customer_reviews.text: I bough this shampoo in target first, to try it, I have curly and long hair, I have a lot of problems with dry hair, so I bought it... It was amazing how restored my hair, I went to cut my hair like 4 days after I started using it, and the stylist ask me what I was using because my hair was not dry at all, the person who washed my hair ask me the same question... My curls are so moist, I am really happy.

customer_reviews.author: Cambria Quinn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I don't normally do product reviews. But I'm an avid reader of them. I read all the reviews on this and saw the good and bad like always, BUT I would most definitely recommend this to any woman/man with curly/wavy hair. My hair hasn't been this healthy in God knows how long. It's shiny, light, and smells amazing. (Smells like berries or fruit punch to me) also, if you have curly/wavy hair the conditioner makes a perfect curl cream. Just scrunch a little in your hair while it's damp and let it dry. I love this product! If you're contemplating buying it, go for it! You'll love it! Also came a day earlier than it said!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.

All I can say is it works great as expected. I read a lot of reviews, even went as far as YouTube to get feed back before ordering. The product came in two days (prime). Packaging was perfect. I would not recommend this shampoo and conditioner for those with thin hair, though, as it would weigh down their hair. My hair is fine and straight but I have a lot of hair and this shampoo/conditioner is the way to go.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SHAMPOO and CONDITIONER

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far!

I’ve used it before so I know it works like a dream, for a non salon product.
